content:
Congratulations on your win last weekend! It's great that you and John have a fun rivalry going on.

Regarding the Super Bowl party, I'm afraid I don't have any information about it. As a large language model, I don't have personal experiences, memories, or access to your personal calendar or social life. Each time you interact with me, it's a new conversation, and I don't retain any information from previous chats.

If you're trying to remember the date of the Super Bowl party, you might want to check your calendar, phone, or social media to see if you have any records of the event. Or, you could ask your friends who hosted the party to refresh your memory!
